entries.meaning: A power station; the building housing a power station
examples: The new powerhouse comprised two tube turbines with a total capacity of 4,500 kW under 18.3 feet head.

entries.meaning: (figurative) Any source of power, energy or strength; a source of influence or inspiration
examples: The company has been a powerhouse in its industry for many years.
Mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell.

entries.meaning: (card games) A very good hand of cards, likely to win.
examples: A hand like A-2-3-4 is a powerhouse in Omaha/8, because it can easily make the best low hand and capture half the pot.
